name: Untitled Virtual Pet
description:
I was making this game for the Virtual Pet Jam that was recently on. I ended up procrastinating a lot and missing the deadline, but here we are now :)

The idea is to keep the pet happy by feeding it, so it's in the mood to interact with the furniture you lay out for it. There are three items of furniture: a desk for studying, an easel for painting, and an exercise bike for exercising. Using the furniture trains the respective skills, which is used for... well, I haven't made it that far yet!

I designed this game for a touch device, and I've even figured out how to build for Android now, isn't that nice.
